org.lazywizard.lazylib.ui

Class LazyFont.LazyChar

  • Object
    • LazyFont.LazyChar
  • Enclosing class:
    LazyFont

    public class LazyFont.LazyChar
extends Object
    Keeps track of the metadata for each supported character in a font. This is used internally to render and wrap text, and it is unlikely that end users will ever need to use this class or any of its methods in their code.

    In the rare case that these methods are needed, their names should match the bitmap font file format found here under the char and kerning headings.

    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    LazyWizard
